Working anywhere. Nach erfolgreichem Bewerbungsprozess, hast Du die Möglichkeit deutschlandweit zu arbeiten. Du wirst entsprechend Deinem Wohnort, dem nächsten Telefónica Standort zugeordnet. Weitere Details besprechen wir mit Dir im Bewerbungsprozess.

Wer wir sind?
Wir sind o2/Telefónica – mit unseren Mobilfunkmarken verbinden wir Millionen von Menschen und bieten unseren Kund:innen mobile Freiheit in der digitalen Welt. Darüber hinaus gestalten wir als führender Telekommunikationsanbieter maßgeblich die Digitalisierung in Deutschland mit. Unsere Fest- und Mobilfunknetze bilden das Rückgrat für den digitalen Wandel von Wirtschaft und Gesellschaft. Und unsere rund 8.000 Mitarbeiter:innen hierzulande treiben die Transformation jeden Tag ein Stück voran – auch in unserem eigenen Unternehmen.

Telefónica zählt zu den Top-Arbeitgebern in Deutschland und ist Teil des globalen Telekommunikationskonzerns Telefónica S.A. mit 114.000 engagierten Mitarbeiter:innen weltweit.

Werde auch Du Teil unseres einzigartigen Teams und lass uns gemeinsam etwas bewegen!

Zielsetzung der Stelle
Als Data Scientist (m/w/d) hast Du Freude daran Data-Science-Modelle entlang der Customer Journey zu erstellen und zu implementieren. Mit Deinen Analysen trägst Du dazu bei Entscheidungen noch besser zu machen. In einem agilen Umfeld verantwortest Du Deine eigenen Aufgaben im Rahmen von Projekten und bist zuständig für operative analytische Prozesse. Du hast die Möglichkeit auf neuester Infrastruktur (Cloud) zu arbeiten und bestehende Prozesse dorthin zu entwickeln.

Was sind Deine Herausforderungen bei uns?
Mit Deinen Kenntnissen im Umfeld Machine Learning und künstliche Intelligenz treibst Du die Entwicklung analytischer Modelle zur Vorhersage von Kundenverhalten im Umfeld analytischer Kontakt- und Risikooptimierung voran. Dabei geht es z.B. um Themen wie Zahlungsfähigkeit, Mahnwesen oder das Finden des richtigen Produkts für die richtigen Kund:innen.
Dank Deiner Analysen erkennen wir Chancen und Risiken in Projekten und Prozessen und leiten daraus gemeinsam mit internen Kund:innen die richtigen Entscheidungen ab.
Du bringst bestehende analytische Prozesse in eine Cloud-Umgebung. Deren Automatisierung zählt ebenso zu Deinen Aufgaben wie die Verbesserung dieser Prozesse mittels neuer Machine-Learning und Data-Engineering-Methoden.
Wissens- und Projektmanagement hältst Du in Confluence und JIRA fest und tauschst Dich regelmäßig mit Kolleginnen und Kollegen zwecks Know-How-Transfer aus.
Deine Ergebnisse präsentierst Du Kollegen und Management in deutscher und englischer Sprache.

Was bringst Du mit?
Studium der (Wirtschafts-)Informatik, Statistik, Mathematik, Naturwissenschaften, Wirtschaftswissenschaften, Sozialwissenschaften oder vergleichbare Ausbildung.
Du bringst ca. zwei Jahre Erfahrung in der Entwicklung und Implementierung von Machine-Learning-Modellen in analytischen Projekten oder Prozessen mit.
Du hast sehr gute Kenntnisse in der Entwicklung und im Betrieb analytischer Applikationen (DevOps) und zugehöriger Tools und Verfahren (Git, Unit Tests, Continuous Integration).
Du verfügst über sehr gute Python-Kenntnisse und bist vertraut mit ML/DL Libraries und Frameworks (z.B. (Scikit-Learn, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Statsmodel, Keras, Tensorflow).
Praktische Kenntnisse hast Du auch im Umgang mit Datenbanksystemen (SQL,PL/SQL, Hive).
Du verfügst über gute Kenntnisse in der Visualisierung von Analysen, z.B. mit Tableau oder hast Freude daran hier dazuzulernen.
Idealerweise bringst Du bereits erste Erfahrungen beim Arbeiten in einer Cloud-Umgebung mit (z.B. AWS oder Microsoft Azure).
Kenntnisse im Aufsetzen und in der Analyse von Test- und Kontrollgruppendesigns (A/B-Testing) sind von Vorteil.
Du hast Freude daran in interdisziplinären Teams über Bereiche hinweg zu arbeiten und Deine Ideen einzubringen und umzusetzen.

Deine Benefits
Arbeitsplatz: Moderne und ergonomisch ausgestattete Büroräume, sowie ein Open Space und Open Desk-Modell.
Kommunikation: Ein Smartphone Deiner Wahl zur dienstlichen und privaten Nutzung sowie die Möglichkeit über ein Guthaben auch Partner:innen, Freunde und Familie zu versorgen, ist für uns selbstverständlich.
Für Verpflegung ist gesorgt: Kostenlose Kaffeespezialitäten und Wasser stehen Dir jederzeit zur Verfügung ebenso wie eine Kantine und eine Cafeteria.
Weiterentwicklung ganz individuell: Mit kontinuierlichen Trainings erreichst Du mit uns Deine Ziele. Zudem kannst Du mit „Beyond“ auch in andere interessante Bereiche mittels Job- oder Projektrotationen reinschnuppern.
Altersvorsorge: Verschiedene Modelle der Altersvorsorge stehen Dir zur Verfügung (z. B. Vermögenswirksame Leistungen, Betriebliche Altersvorsorge etc.)
Soziales Engagement: Wir engagieren uns auch außerhalb der Unternehmensgrenzen, Du hast die Möglichkeit z. B. an Telefónica „Volunteering Days“ oder „Volunteering Holidays“ teilzunehmen.
Gesundheit: Unter FEEL GOOD findest Du ein vielfältiges Angebot für Deine persönliche Gesundheit und die Vereinbarkeit von Beruf und Freizeit. Es reicht von Bewegungs- und Entspannungsangeboten über Webinare und Kooperationen bis hin zu einem umfassenden Beratungsangebot zu Kinder- und Seniorenbetreuung sowie psychosozialer Beratung.

Wie Du dich bewirbst und was Du noch wissen solltest?
Überzeuge uns mit Deinem aussagekräftigen Lebenslauf sowie dazugehörigen Zeugnissen. Ein Motivationsschreiben oder Anschreiben brauchst Du bei uns nicht. Bitte beachte, dass Bewerbungen nur über unser Bewerberportal möglich sind und Bewerbungen per E-Mail nicht berücksichtigt werden können.

Du hast Fragen zu unserem Bewerbungsprozess und Interesse an weiteren Informationen zu der Stelle? Dann wende dich bitte an unser Talent Operations Team (talent-operations@telefonica.com)

Bei gleicher Eignung werden Bewerber:innen mit einer Schwerbehinderung bevorzugt berücksichtigt. Alle Geschlechter sind gleichermaßen willkommen.

JobTitle: Working Student Data Science/ Data Engineering (m/f/d)
fullJobDescribtion:
HypoVereinsbank is part of UniCredit, a simple, successful Pan European Commercial Bank, with a fully plugged in Corporate & Investment Banking, delivering a unique Western, Central and Eastern European network to its extensive client franchise. We offer our employees professional development all over Europe, consisting of both job and learning opportunities. UniCredit has been certified as an European Top Employer returning year-for-year consistently high employee engagement.

Digitization and our commitment to ESG principles (sustainability & social justice) are the basis for our actions. They support us in providing excellent support to our stakeholders and in shaping a sustainable future for our customers, society and our employees. Since diversity in a company is based on the uniqueness of its employees, we respect and promote individuality in all dimensions of diversity.
UniCredit Bank AG is continuously extending its Data & Analytics activities. The Digital and Intelligence Office plays a crucial role both in terms of managing the underlying data as well as providing analytical capabilities to the business and control functions of the bank. For this position we are looking for a future Data Scientist/Data Engineer with a keen desire to gain experience in the development of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence applications.
You will be involved in the development and maintenance of machine learning models to support automation of critical business processes and applications. With your technical and personal competence, you will join a team responsible for the building of data products for the bank utilizing our big data platform.
What you can expect from us
Explore and extract the value from data enabling the Businesses and Competence Lines of UniCredit Group to generate new sources of revenues or cost efficiencies opportunities.
Manage and analyze multiple sources and datasets with the purpose of detecting unexpected regularities and patterns in available data to discover new insights.
Define Analytics models and implement prototypes applying advanced statistical and methodological skills.
Enable the extraction of value from data by building data assets that can be used to assist the various divisions of UniCredit Group to generate new sources of revenues or cost efficiencies opportunities.
Work closely with the product owners and data scientists to ensure the right data is sourced and transformed according to requirements.
Manage and analyze multiple sources and datasets with the purpose of creating common datasets that can be used repeatedly to derive value for the organization.
What we expect from you
Studying towards a Bachelors or Masters Degree in Computer Science or other related discipline
Possible experience in data engineering or data science
Good knowledge of Data Analysis, Data Engineering or Machine Learning
Good knowledge of Data Exploration
Good understanding of Python, PySpark
Good understanding of Data Transformation
Goal-oriented, structured and independent way of working
High level of commitment and ability to work under pressure as well as a convincing and confident manner
Ability to adapt to a dynamic, constantly changing environment
Distinct social competence, ability to work in a team
Ability to work in English, German and or Italian an advantage
Our offer to you
#BalanceYourLife – Digitization and flexibility shape our modern working world. Design your working life the way it suits you best: Whether in the office or remotely. You get an employment contract with up to 20 hours per week, which you can arrange freely thanks to flexitime.
#UnlockYourPotential – With us, you are guaranteed a steep learning curve. In your multifaceted work experience, you can supplement your theoretical knowledge from your studies with practical insights and thus find out where your passion lies.
#MakeInnovationHappen – FinTechs, Big Data, Bitcoins: Banking is evolving rapidly. Actively shape the digital transformation of one of the most change-driven industries by contributing your fresh perspective and innovative ideas.
#ComeAndStay – For top working students, we have a retention program so that we can stay in touch after your studies and hopefully soon welcome you as a permanent employee.
#JoinOurTeam – Our employees are the driving force behind our success and therefore our greatest asset. Because we are aware of our responsibility as an employer, we have once again been certified as Top Employer. Become part of our team!
#ComeAsYouAre – We are committed to a fair and inclusive working environment. That is why we have signed the “Charta der Vielfalt”, are part of the Valuable 500 and support people with disabilities in the workplace. The UniCorns represent our LGBTQI+ colleagues, while through our Gender Diversity Program we ensure equal opportunities for everyone. Inclusion is a responsibility we recognize and embrace.

Company Description

Jochen Schweizer and mydays, the two leading brands on the adventure market, were united under the umbrella of the JSMD Group in October 2017. Our group also includes the booking platform provider Regiondo GmbH.
As Germany's largest online provider of experience gifts we can enrich the lives of our customers even more comprehensively with our combined competence and strength: We know what sparks squeaks, adrenaline attacks, expressions of love and storms of enthusiasm. Our mission: inspire in a warm way and create unforgettable memories - for everyone at any time at any place! We give our best every day with over 500 colleagues.

Job Description
Develop big data ETL-Pipelines with Python and Spark (Pyspark) in an agile environment
Connect a variety of data sources (SAP-HANA, Google, (non)relational databases, Kafka Stream etc.) and integrate it into our cloud based DataLake (Microsoft Azure)
Work closely with the product owner and design the data model to match their needs for sourced tables and structured Datamart’s)
Make sure the Data Warehouse keeps its data integrity and availability

Qualifications
University degree in economics with a technical focus, business informatics or any other related area of study
3 years of working experience in the data and business intelligence field
Very good Python knowledge
Solid experience with Apache Spark and big data
Experience in agile Software-Development (Git, Jira, Jenkins CI)
Know-how of the latest toolsets on Data integration, storage and modelling in the context of Data Warehouse and Data Lake (preferably Databricks, Kafka Streaming, Airflow)
Sound understanding of distributed systems

Additional Information

We ware looking for a (Senior) Data Engineer/Architect to initiate, manage and automate our routines to gather (un)structured data from several different data sources and load it into our cloud-based Data Warehouse.
You will work within our Business Intelligence team, which consists of Data Engineers, Data Scientist and Data Analysts. Furthermore, you will work closely with other IT departments to ensure the operation of our data warehouse. Our Data Engineers work with the latest technologies to build our Data Warehouse as the single point of truth for the company.

SupplyOn AG
München
Berufserfahrung (Junior Level)
Berufserfahrung
IT
Publiziert: 2022-07-14
Unser SupplyOn Team aus vielen bunten Persönlichkeiten wächst an neuen Themenstellungen, Personen und Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten. Um gemeinsam Neues bewegen zu können, suchen wir ab sofort für unser Analytics-Team Team einen Data Engineer (m/w/d). SupplyOn entwickelt und betreibt die weltweit führende Supply-Chain-Collaboration-Plattform für die Automotive-, Fertigungs- und Aerospace-Industrie. Unser einzigartiges globales Business-Netzwerk verbindet über 70% der wichtigsten Produktionsunternehmen weltweit. Wir decken durch unser umfassendes Lösungsportfolio alle Geschäftsprozesse an der Schnittstelle zwischen einem Unternehmen und seinen Geschäftspartnern wie Lieferanten, Dienstleister und Spediteure ab.
Digitale Ökosysteme werden immer wichtiger, um die Zusammenarbeit zwischen Geschäftspartnern auf ein ganz neues Level zu heben. Unsere Lösung bildet die ideale Basis, um Lieferketten resistent, zukunftssicher und nachhaltig zu machen.
Wir sind ein Joint Venture von Bosch, Continental, ZF und Schaeffler.
Wir freuen uns, wenn du Teil unseres Teams wirst.
Deine Aufgaben als Data Engineer (m/w/d)
Als Data Engineer (m/w/d) entwickelst du zusammen mit deinem Scrum-Team leistungsstarke und skalierbare Applikationen im Bereich Supply Chain Management, die bei unseren Kunden weltweit für effiziente Geschäftsprozesse mit ihren Lieferanten sorgen. Unser Fokus liegt dabei auf einem modernen, Cloud-native Technologie-Stack für Analytics.
Du entwickelst ETL Jobs für den Abzug von Daten aus on Premise Oracle Systemen zur Weiterverarbeitung in der Microsoft Azure Cloud
Du designst performante Datenmodelle und optimierst Datenbank Anwendungen
Du unterstützt bei Design, Aufbau und Optimierung von End-to-End Cloud Lösungen
Microservices integrierst du auf IaaS- und PaaS-Ebene in die Cloud-Architektur mit den entsprechenden Datenbanken
Darüber hinaus trägst du mit deiner Erfahrung zum Wissensaustausch bei und treibst den praktikablen Einsatz von agilen und DevOps-Prinzipien im Sinne von Continuous Delivery und Integration (CI/CD) voran
Das bringst du als Data Engineer (m/w/d) ein
Du hast erste Erfahrungen in der professionellen Softwareentwicklung oder in akademischen Projekten - idealerweise in den Bereichen Big Data, Data Warehousing, Microsoft Analytics Stack.
SQL ist deine Muttersprache. Fundierte Kenntnisse in Oracle und Microsoft SQL Server. Weitere Sprachen, z.B. Scriptsprachen oder C#/Java sind dir nicht unbekannt.
Du hast Lust darauf, mit modernen Cloud DevOps Ansätzen und Technologien (CI/CD Pipelines, Azure Synapse, Apache Spark) zu arbeiten.
Du denkst agil, arbeitest im Team selbstorganisiert und bist motiviert, Verantwortung zu übernehmen.
Englisch beherrschst du sicher.
Das kannst du von uns erwarten
Die Zusammenarbeit in einem tollen Team, das mit dir gemeinsam viel bewegen möchte.
Ein Arbeitsumfeld mit hohen Freiheitsgraden und Gestaltungsspielraum.
Flexible Arbeitszeiten und remote arbeiten? Das unterstützen wir gerne!
Ist ein Umzug für die Anstellung bei uns nötig? Wir unterstützen dich dabei mit einem umfangreichen Relocation-Package.
Attraktive Vorsorgeleistungen, die weit über den üblichen Standard hinausgehen.
Persönliche und professionelle Weiterentwicklung ist uns ein großes Anliegen und fördern wir stark. Überzeuge dich gerne selbst von unseren Entwicklungsperspektiven und Benefits auf unseren Karriereseiten.
Bei SupplyOn leben wir eine Kultur der Akzeptanz und Offenheit. Unabhängig von kulturellem Hintergrund, Ethnie, Herkunft, sexueller Orientierung oder geschlechtlicher Identität bieten wir unseren Mitarbeitenden ein Arbeitsumfeld, in dem wir durch die Vielfalt von Denkweisen und Erfahrungen voneinander lernen und miteinander wachsen.
Infos zum Kennenlernprozess:
Wir möchten dich gerne umfänglich kennenlernen und deswegen finden 2 bis 3 Kennenlern-Gespräche mit deinen zukünftigen Kolleg*innen statt. Für diese Gespräche nutzen wir Telefon- und Videokonferenzen und können so einen zügigen Ablauf gewährleisten. Mindestens eines dieser Gespräche wird in der Regel vor Ort in unserem Office stattfinden.
Art der Stelle: Vollzeit

WE ARE THE STRATEGIC EXPERIENCE DESIGN COMPANY OF ALLIANZ.
We resolve complexity to transform the ordinary in progressive ways. We are experts at making complex products simple and digitally accessible, delivering validated user experiences in the business of trust. Our strength is built on shared values that inspire and we are always looking for creative and passionate people who are interested in joining a great team.
YOUR ROLE & RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE STRATEGY DEVELOPMENT, CONCEPTION AND PROVISIONING OF DATA ANALYTICS USE CASES AND DATA DRIVEN DECISION MAKING.
Our Data & Analytics-Team enables our partners to use their various data sources for the best possible customer engagement and a highly personalized user experience. We support our clients in identifying, designing and implementing data and analytics solutions. We help build analytics capabilities which integrate with our clients' business strategies and provide insights into key business questions. Our team designs data processes and architectures, develops and provides data solutions for companies of all sizes.
With us, you will be part of a team exploring and structuring data science use cases and solutions.
Identification, evaluation and further development of ongoing and new projects in the areas of Brand, Communication and Business Innovation, as well as internal development fields where Data can be used to create added value
Strategy development, sparring and coordination of interdisciplinary teams for the implementation of data projects
Integrate Data into every step of creative processes: from target group analysis, to deriving creative insights, to digital analytics and success measurement
Definition and development of KPIs and measurement models, development of performance measurement as well as dashboard solutions
Development of surveys, as well as collaboration with our research colleagues
Trend, market and competitor analyses with the support of social listening, consumer panels, opinion research and survey tools, social media tools, etc.

YOUR EXPERIENCE IS WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR:
Completed studies in Business Administration, Media Informatics, Business Informatics or a comparable education/qualification and at least two years professional experience
Experience as a Strategist in a media/advertising agency or a company in the online industry is an advantage
Proactive way of thinking and acting, empathic appearance temperment and independent, ability to work alone and in a team
Basic understanding of data and qualitative and quantitative market research methods
Analytical thinking and a holistic view for strategies to bring information gained from data simply and understandably on the point
High intrinsic motivation and interest in current online and data trends
Strong passion and solidified experience in the field of Digital Analytics & BI
Experience in data manipulation, as well as knowledge of statistical tools (Python, R, SAS, Stata, SPSS)
Knowledge of media targeting of various campaigns/experience with media agencies is a plus
Good German and English skills complete your profile and make you the ideal candidate for Kaiser X Labs
WHAT WE OFFER IS AWESOME!
Here you would enjoy working within a field of proven data experts (architects, engineers, scientists, analysts and operations) and within a team that interacts closely to successfully apply new challenges such as AI/machine learning.
Furthermore we offer:
A smooth learning curve
A variety of different projects that you can implement with the various companies and the respective experts in the field
A great Kaiser team, where culture is not just words but actions
Access to the best tools on the market to work digitally
Data Strategy is becoming more relevant every year, with our team you can help shape the field from the top down
At Kaiser X Labs we believe that a healthy work-life balance benefits everyone and that great teams need diverse talents. As a company of Allianz, we are able to offer you competitive compensation and benefits in line with your experience. And we provide you the chance to work in an open and interdisciplinary space where diverse perspectives come together to shape the future of insurance.
APPLY NOW
Your strength and experience is your most important asset; therefore, everyone, independent of other features, such as gender, race, descent, religion, sexual orientation, age or disability is warmly welcomed.

JobTitle: Senior Researcher AI and Synthetic Data (f/m/x)
fullJobDescribtion:
IT IS INFRASTRUCTURE THAT CONNECTS PEOPLE WITH ONE ANOTHER.
SHARE YOUR PASSION.
Complex systems require careful maintenance - ideally from people whose good ideas and enthusiasm can truly shine in a supportive work environment. Because people like this make IT unique, smart and ready for the future. Without IT, the innovative power of the BMW Group would simply not exist.
Work with us on science that is turning fiction into reality with industrial applications of latest advances in machine learning, synthetic data and domain adaptation. We are extending our team seeking experienced researchers in this rapidly developing field at the crossroads of AI, computer graphics, mathematics, algorithms, embedded systems and computer science in general, deep tech startup culture and mounting international competition and rapidly evolving ecosystems.

What awaits you?
You will work on machine learning applications in multi-sensor perception and sensor data fusion for safe automated driving functions, while solving challenges of domain adaption, sensor-modelling, scenario driven development and corner cases identification, along with simulation-based generation of training and validation data.
You will conduct independent research beyond the state-of-the-art, identify technology gaps and actively contribute to closing them through technical concepts, designing and coding prototype implementations, leveraging industrial and academic partnerships.
You will be coordinating large multi-lateral projects developing advanced algorithms and applications of machine learning for automotive in general, and for autonomous driving in particular.
You will collaborate closely with experts across all lines of business to identify, analyze, algorithmically decompose, and solve complex tasks in the industrial application of advanced machine learning.
While at it meet energetic start-ups, have instigating discussions with leading university researchers, draft research plans for the relevant product and feature roadmap, or meet young researchers by hosting workshops and co-organizing events.

What should you bring along?
University degree in computer science, mathematics, physics, engineering, or a comparable qualification.
Several years of experience in the general field of machine learning and in coordinating large, pre-competitive research initiatives and managing publicly funded projects.
Ideally experience in corporate AI application portfolio management and use case engineering.
Experience with AI applications in the automotive industry and their efficient embedded systems implementation is an advantage.
Relevant practical experience with selected AI tech stacks, tool chains, synthetic data and simulators.
Preferably experience in project management, ideally leadership experience supervising and guiding research groups.
Successfully defined and implemented research plans; application for and participation in publicly funded research consortia at the national and international/EU level.
Business fluent English.

Die AVANTGARDE Group ist mit ihrem Portfolio an spezialisierten Agenturen ein Multiplayer in der Experience Economy. Gegründet 1985 in München, hat sich AVANTGARDE zu einer global tätigen Unternehmensgruppe mit mehr als 850 Mitarbeiter: innen an weltweit 12 Standorten entwickelt.
Im Agentur-Bereich gibt es neben der Brand Experience Agency AVANTGARDE weitere Agenturmarken wie Slash.Digital, Trendbüro oder Green Game mit einem breiten Spektrum an Lösungen und Dienstleistungen.
AVANTGARDE bespielt alle physischen und digitalen Touchpoints entlang der Customer Journey. Gemäß der Mission "Creating Fans" steht die Kundenbindung im Zentrum der Maßnahmen.
AVANTGARDE PMC ist ein Teil der AVANTGARDE GROUP und ist eine Agentur für internationales Performance Marketing & Data Analytics – wir steigern digitale ROIs und bauen Marken nachhaltig auf.
Unser Team besteht aus einer gesunden Mischung von digitalen Champions und jungen Talenten in allen Disziplinen des Digitalen Marketing.
DEINE AUFGABEN
Als (Junior) Data Analyst (m/w/x) bei AVANTGARDE PMC verstehst Du Dich als Motor und Antreiber für alle Themen rund um Analytics, Tagging und Tracking. In dieser Rolle unterstützt Du Unternehmen, Entscheidungen auf Basis von Daten zu treffen.
Du modellierst und visualisierst Daten aus internen wie externen Quellen und bereitest sie für Analysen und Reports auf
Du betreust operative Analysesysteme, Datenbanken und Visualisierungs-Tools und entwickelst diese weiter
Du begleitest Projekte für komplexe Datenanalysen und Implementierung-Maßnahmen von Tagging-Systemen für die Bereiche Brand, User Experience, E-Commerce und Loyalty
Du erprobst neue Methoden, Technologien & Best Practices mit Deinem Innovationsgeist und einem hohen Grad an Freiraum
DEIN PROFIL
Du hast einen Studienabschluss in Informatik oder Statistik – super! Wichtiger ist uns jedoch Dein Feuer und Deine Leidenschaft für das Thema Data Analytics. Gerne geben wir auch technisch interessierten Hochschulabsolventen die Möglichkeit sich in das Thema einzuarbeiten
Du bist versiert in Google Analytics (4) und Google Tag-Manager. SQL ist für Dich keine Unbekannte sondern neben Datenbanken (z.B. BigQuery) Dein tägliches Toolset
Du wolltest immer schon Javascript zum Tagging lernen und Dich kreativ im Bereich der Datenvisualisierung mit Google Data Studio oder Microsoft Power Bi ausleben?
Du hast den Mut neue Wege zu gehen, hast Spaß an Analyse & Statistik und lässt andere gerne in Form von Präsentationen oder Workshops an Deinem Erkenntnissen teilhaben? Dann mach diese Herausforderung zu Deinem neuen Projekt!
BENEFITS
Mit der AVA Academy bist Du immer up to date! Profitiere von regelmäßigen Talks, Workshops, Sprachkursen, individuellen Schulungen und Zugang zu LinkedIn Learning
Bye, bye Langeweile – Wir bieten Dir flexible Modelle wie Home Office Option, individuelle Stundengestaltung, Job Rotation, globales Office Hopping und Sabbatical
Mit dem Rad ins Grüne, schwitzen im Fitnessstudio oder eine ausgiebige Shoppingtour – Das Company Bike, eine vergünstigte Body & Soul Mitgliedschaft und zahlreiche Rabattaktionen machen‘s möglich
Sei Teil unserer legendären Team-/ und Company Events. Hier geht es vor allem darum Inspirationen zu sammeln, Ideen auszutauschen und zu networken
Nachhaltigkeit ist für uns nicht nur ein Buzz Word, deshalb sind wir Net Zero zertifiziert und verfolgen einen ökologischen Nachhaltigkeitsprozess für all unsere Projekte
Und nicht zu vergessen: Bei uns verbringst Du Deine Coffee-/Lunch Breaks auf Münchens schönster Dachterrasse mit eigenem Barista und waschechten Schafen
NA, HABEN WIR DICH ÜBERZEUGT?
Dann bewirb’ Dich mit Deinem Lebenslauf bei uns! Nina Lütte freut sich auf Deine Bewerbung!

Over 500 million! That’s the number of patients that Sandoz reaches every year with our affordable generic medicines. We can only reach that many patients thanks to the incredible efforts of our global IP team. In IP we unlock the patent protected parts of the market to enable early patient access to affordable medicines and create savings to the healthcare systems across the globe. The IP data specialist supports the team to identify those early launch opportunities through managing our IP information and taking a creative view of our data to generate unique insights into how we can serve patients and drive value.

Your key responsibilities:
Your responsibilities include, but not limited to:
Ensure data integrity and consistency through processes and tools, including identifying and addressing key data gaps
Manage update of IP data in respective systems using internal and external sources
Ensure data updates are reviewed and approved by the respective data owner, eg. GPA
Identifies opportunities to feed and improve internal IP data systems from external sources eg. Orange book data, EPO data
Proactively identifies opportunities to improve and enhance our data systems in reaction to our clients’ needs
Project management with external stakeholders to anticipate and prepare data structure change
Coordinates with IT on technical implementation of automation
Timely update of IP data, eg. Inclusion of newly granted/pending patents with expiry dates and identification number in IP data tool
Prioritizing work packages ensuring high impact is achieved and resolving data entry/update issues
Proactively identify gaps/enhancements in data structures and provide solutions and understanding of different IP and Sandoz data tools and their connections between each other

Commitment to Diversity & Inclusion:
Novartis is committed to building an outstanding, inclusive work environment and diverse teams representative of the patients and communities we serve.
Minimum requirements
What you’ll bring to the role:
Relevant university degree (commercial, legal, IT) min. 3-5 years of experience in related field
English is required, German preferable
Advanced Excel skills, experience in data structure design and IP data knowledge
Ability to explain IT & data structure information to non-IT colleagues
Experience in managing mass data uploads and issue management

You’ll receive: (optional)
Competitive salary; Performance based annual bonus; Work/life integration; Eligible to Sandoz pension plan; 30 working days' holiday per calendar year; Subsidised on-site cafeteria; Free shuttle bus between Sandoz and Holzkirchen train station; Additional benefits.

Why Sandoz?
500 million patients were touched by Sandoz generic and biosimilar medicines in 2020 and while we’re proud of this, we know there is more we could do to continue to help pioneer access to medicines for people around the world.

How will we do this? We believe new insights, perspectives and ground-breaking solutions can be found at the intersection of medical science and digital innovation. That a diverse, equitable and inclusive environment inspires new ways of working.

We believe our potential can thrive and grow in an unbossed culture underpinned by integrity, curiosity and flexibility. And we can reinvent what's possible, when we collaborate with courage to aggressively and ambitiously tackle the world’s toughest medical challenges. Because the greatest risk in life, is the risk of never trying!

Imagine what you could do here at Sandoz!

Commitment to Diversity & Inclusion:
Sandoz is committed to building an outstanding, inclusive work environment and diverse team’s representative of the patients and communities we serve.

The Artificial Intelligence Group in Reinsurance Development leverages state-of-the-art machine learning technologies to shape the future of the insurance industry. The data can be internal, external, structured or unstructured. Our missions encompass improving underwriting (risk assessment and pricing), claims management decisions, and offering new services and business models through data-driven methods. Our focus areas span a wide range of applications, including automated information extraction, risk model improvements, remote sensing, and the insurance of algorithms. Our department cooperates closely with Data Engineering, IT, business units, and the Innoscouts. We offer you the possibility of applying the latest machine learning and deep learning methods to the insurance space within a highly motivated team of experts. As the world’s largest reinsurer, we can provide an extremely diverse and exciting set of business opportunities and datasets for you to work on. We offer unparalleled development opportunities in a rapidly developing field within a leading quantitative organisation.
We are looking for a creative thinker to drive the application of natural language processing (NLP), computer vision and machine learning (ML) algorithms as well as statistical procedures to solve a range of exciting challenges in the insurance space.
Your job
Actively working on projects that enable business units to generate more and better business (according to quantitative and qualitative aspects) using NLP, ML, and statistics
Developing and implementing AI solutions, from prototypes to production
Supporting and advising business units in applying the latest methods and providing a central source for specialised data analysis and modelling know-how, tools, and methods
Presenting findings and the systems developed to internal and external stakeholders
Identifying and assessing the potential of statistical, ML and NLP innovations and technologies that could offer potential competitive advantages in the insurance space
Networking with existing quantitative units in the reporting and analysis fields and with IT to create an AI community
Your profile
University degree (master and above) in a quantitative field (mathematics, computer science, physics, engineering or business analytics) with a solid understanding of probabilities, statistics, and machine
Very good theoretical and practical understanding of modern machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, as well as expertise in at least one of the following areas: natural language processing (NLP), computer vision, knowledge graphs, recommender systems or time series
Excellent presentation, strategic thinking, consulting and project management skills, plus a demonstrated interest in taking ownership of technical initiatives from coordination to implementation
Outstanding Python programming skills and proficiency with ML frameworks such as Pytorch or TensorFlow
Substantial knowledge of bets practices in software development (version control and testing), architecture design, object-oriented programming, data structures, and algorithms
A PhD, publications in scientific fields related to data analytics or open-source contributions would be a plus
Readiness to embrace innovation, forward-looking perspective, mindset and behaviour that reflect the entire group, pronounced service focus, ability to work in a team, and a very high level of commitment
High level of accountability as well as ability to deal with uncertainty and execute in an ambiguous environment
Experience in the insurance, risk management or financial services industry would be beneficial
Very good command of English and a willingness to travel
About us
As the world's leading reinsurance company with more than 11,000 employees at over 50 locations, Munich Re introduces a paradigm shift in the way you think about insurance. By turning uncertainty into a manageable risk we enable fundamental change. Join us working on topics today that will concern society tomorrow, whether that be climate change, major construction projects, medical risk assessment or even space travel. Together we embrace a culture where multiskilled teams dare to think big. We create the new and the different for our clients and cultivate innovation. Sounds like you? Make it happen and be part of Munich Re.
You will work in an environment where we think big: Change and culture are continuously role-modeled. We create and articulate a compelling and ambitious shared purpose, vision and direction. We pave the way towards success and see failure as learning
You are going to experience that we care & dare: We are empathetic. We know when to lead and know when to let others lead. We attract, grow and coach future leaders
We communicate in a clear & authentic way: We interact with a positive and humble spirit. We solicit feedback, ask and listen, learn and unlearn
You will grow with your clients: Whatever our role, we support business, in an efficient and effective way, to create value for our clients. We embrace new ways of working leveraging digitalization to deliver solutions
Join us, and experience that we lead the We: We have a passion for winning and growing as a team. We inspire people to be capable of joint performance. We create an inclusive environment where different thoughts, generations, cultures and experiences are valued and encouraged

Job summary *Flexibility for alternate EU Amazon offices* Amazon’s mission is to be the most customer centric company in the world. The Workforce Staffing organization is on the front line of that mission by hiring the hourly fulfilment associates who make that mission a reality. To drive the necessary growth and continued scale of Amazon’s associate needs within a constrained employment environment, Amazon is creating a Workforce Staffing Analytics program. This program will re-invent how Amazon attracts, communicates with, and ultimately hires its hourly associates. This team will own multi-layered research and program implementation to drive deep learnings, process improvements, and strategic recommendations to global leadership. Are you passionate about data? Are you a tinkerer by trade? Do you enjoy questioning the status quo? Do complex and difficult challenges excite you? If yes, this may be the team for you. As a Data Scientist in Workforce Staffing, your work is focused on research programs to deeply understand the people that make up our hourly workforce. You understand that even when hiring hundreds of thousands of hourly associates across multiple types of roles and businesses, the experience of each candidate matters. You use your deep expertise in statistics (regressions, multilevel models, structural equation models, etc.), and data collection in a variety of settings (e.g., field studies, surveys, existing large data sets) to define and answer nebulous problems. You leverage your quantitative background to develop and test theoretical frameworks and design experiments. You design, deployment, and conduct analysis of our global candidate research activities, using experimental, quasi-experimental, and RCT methods. You relentlessly obsess over understanding our candidates and what attracts them to Amazon. You work with colleagues across Research, Data Science, Business Intelligence and related teams to enable Amazon find and hire the right candidates for the right roles at an unprecedented scale. This will be a highly visible role across multiple key deliverables for our global organization. If you are passionate and curious about data, obsess over customers, love questioning the status quo, and want to make the world a better place, let’s chat.
Master's or PhD in Statistics, Applied Math, Operations Research, Economics, or a related quantitative field with at least three years of working experience as a Data or Research Scientist.
Experienced in writing academic-styled papers for presenting both the methodologies used and results for data science projects.
Demonstrable track record of dealing well with ambiguity, ability to self-motivate, prioritizing needs, and delivering results in a dynamic environment.
Combination of deep technical skills and business savvy to interface with all levels and disciplines within our and our customer’s organizations
Experience in recruitment or operations

Interpretation and derivation of concrete recommendations for action, review of existing hypotheses.
Performing analysis and processing of ad hoc report requests using data from external and internal sources.
Evaluation of data consistency and checking for data errors.
Support in modeling and forecasting business trends through the use of historical data sets.
Visualize data by creating meaningful automated management dashboards and reports.
Conception, integration, adaptation, and further development of processes.
Participation in internal projects and internal business consulting.

Qualifications
Study of (business-) informatics, data & business analytics or a comparable qualification, ideally with several years of professional experience.
Business background knowledge and understanding of business processes (preferably in the sales environment in an ERP landscape).
Business fluency in German as well as very good written and spoken English (business language is English).
A strong understanding of numbers and business administration paired with a solution-oriented, determined, and structured way of working.
Well-founded analytical and logical understanding with quick apprehension.
Enthusiasm for complex tasks.
Quality awareness as well as customer and service-oriented thinking and acting.
Commitment and team spirit as well as an independent and conscientious way of working.
Very good knowledge of common Microsoft Office applications.
Intercultural openness and communication skills.
Experience with BI applications is an advantage.
Affinity with the automotive industry is desirable.

Additional Information
International company with various development opportunities
Open and diverse corporate culture
Wide range of trainings and education opportunities
13 monthly salaries and optional allowances
30 days of vacation and a flextime model for flexible working hours
Generous daily allowance for business trips
Modern offices, canteen onsite and free parking
Free coffee, tea and water
Employee benefits, such as attractive leasing offers, net salary optimization, additional private health insurance, free employee advice assistance hotline and much more.
Company events
It has come to our attention that various individuals have contacted people offering false employment opportunities with DENSO. Such scams are fraudulent and intended to steal from the victims.
By making you aware of this, we hope to avoid and ultimately stop victims from falling for this scam. Please do not provide any personal or financial information and do not send any money to anyone you suspect of recruitment fraud.
If you are contacted by someone whom you suspect may not be appropriately representing DENSO, please email: EU_DIEU_TALENTACQUISITION@eu.denso.com. Please forward the original email that you received that includes the original subject line and complete header information.
Do not send CVs or vacancy applications to that email address as it will not be reviewed or considered. If you wish to apply for a job, please submit your application for an open position to https://careers.smartrecruiters.com/DENSOINTERNATIONALEUROPE

Die CINTELLIC Consulting Group ist eine der führenden Unternehmensberatungen für das digitale Kundenmanagement. Wir treiben bei DAX-Konzernen und renommierten Mittelständlern die Digitalisierung voran und helfen Umsätze und Erträge zu steigern. Wir arbeiten ergebnisfokussiert und setzen unser exzellentes Know-how im Zusammenspiel von Business, Data und Technology ein.
Sie finden bei uns karrierestarke Jobs im Consulting in einem Team ohne Ellenbogen. Ausgezeichnet als Great Place to Work® und kununu-Top-Company. Mehr zu unserer Wertekultur erfahren Sie hier.
Werden Sie Teil unseres Teams, begleiten Sie aktiv digitale Zukunftsthemen und schreiben Sie CINTELLIC-Erfolgsgeschichte mit!
Diese Stelle ist als unbefristete Vollzeit- oder Teilzeitstelle (min. 80%) ausgeschrieben.

Sie analysieren und entwickeln analytische Lösungen in enger Zusammenarbeit mit den Fachbereichen unserer Kunden

Sie verfügen über sehr gute Deutschkenntnisse im mündlichen wie schriftlichen Sprachgebrauch

: Discover personalized medical solutions for environmentally triggered diseases to promote a healthier society in a rapidly changing world.

We are seeking as soon as possible a highly motivated scientist (f/m/x) to join the Research Unit Molecular Epidemiology of the Institute of Epidemiology. The group deciphers the molecular causes and mechanisms of complex diseases like type 2 diabetes, cardiovascular diseases, allergies, lung diseases, or obesity. Our main goals are the better understanding of pathophysiology of selected common diseases and the finding of early markers of diseases. We use both population-based cohorts (KORA, NAKO) and special case populations for this purpose.

Data scientist OMICS research (f/m/x) 101663

Full time

Neuherberg near Munich

Professionals, Graduates & Entry-level Professionals

Your responsibilities

You will be involved in statistical analysis of genetic and molecular data (OMICS data from genetics, epigenetics, proteomics and metabolomics). In particular, you will work on the analysis of genetic association studies with genome-wide genotype datasets. Quality controls will also be performed for these OMICS datasets. The results of the studies will be processed and interpreted together with geneticists and clinicians and finally published.

The position is divided in two projects:
In DigiMed Bayern, a P4 medicine (predictive, preventive, personalized, participatory) project funded by the Bavarian State Ministry of Health and Care, high-dimensional OMICS data and their interrelationships are analysed in the longitudinal KORA cohort for cardiovascular disease outcome. Cross-sectional and longitudinal methods as well as methods based on graph databases are used for this purpose.
The SAPCRIN project is integrated into the National Pandemic Cohort Network (NAPKON) of the Network University Medicine (NUM). In this project, patients will be selected with respect to post-covid phenotypes and will be deeply molecularly characterized and analysed.
Your qualifications

Master/Diploma in statistics, bioinformatics, epidemiology, nutritional science or related field.
Enthusiasm for studying diseases and their genetic and molecular causes
Experience working with cohorts
Passion for data analysis of large epidemiological datasets
Very good knowledge of and interest in modern methods of statistics (GWAS, meta-analysis, Mendelian randomization, colocalization)
Experience with machine learning is an advantage
Excellent knowledge of statistical and database programs, especially R.
Experience in presenting achieved research results fluently in German and English
Strong ability to interact with other scientists in an interdisciplinary environment, as the research will be in close collaboration with molecular biologists and data managers.
What we offer you

work-life balance
flexible working hours & working-time models
continuous education and training
30 days annual leave
on-site health management service
home office options
on-site nursery & holiday care
elder care company pension scheme discounted public transport ticket
Munich, with its numerous lakes and its vicinity to the Alps, is considered to be one of the cities with the best quality of life worldwide. With its first-class universities and world-leading research institutions it offers an intellectually stimulating environment.

Provided that the prerequisites are fulfilled, a salary level up to E 13 is possible. Social benefits are based on the collective agreement for the federal public service (TVöD). The position is (initially) limited to 1 year, under certain circumstances an extension can be arranged.

To promote diversity, we welcome applications from talented people regardless of gender, cultural background, nationality, ethnicity, sexual identity, physical abilities, religion and age. Qualified applicants with physical disabilities will be given preference.
If you have obtained a university degree abroad, we require further documents from you regarding the recognition of the degree.

Interested?
If you have further questions, simply contact Dr. Christian Gieger, +49 89 3187 4106, who will be happy to be of assistance. Helmholtz Zentrum München
Deutsches Forschungszentrum für Gesundheit und Umwelt (GmbH)
Institute of Epidemiology
Ingolstädter Landstraße 1

85764 Oberschleißheim

Total E-Quality Award for excellent gender equality policy for women and men: Helmholtz Munich is particularly committed to promoting professional equality between women and men. It therefore aims to increase the proportion of the underrepresented sex in the respective field. Helmholtz Munich is part of the Helmholtz Association, Germany's largest scientific organization. Altogether 43.000 people currently work in its 18 scientific-technical and biological-medical research centers. The Association's annual budget amounts to around 5 billion Euros.

Munkakör megnevezése: Senior EgIR szakértő (Energetikus)

Munkavégzés megyéje: Jász-Nagykun-Szolnok

Munkavégzés helye: 5000 Szolnok, Nagysándor József út 24.

Jelentkezési határidő: 2022-08-30

Senior EgIR szakértő (Energetikus)

A VOLÁNBUSZ Zrt. közel 100 éves múlttal, 63 járműfenntartási és 76 forgalmi telephellyel rendelkező, országosan működő, stabil hátterű, 100%-ban magyar tulajdonú állami vállalat. Országonkénti összehasonlításban a legnagyobb járműparkkal rendelkező európai autóbuszos szolgáltató.

Társaságunk évente csaknem 670 millió utast szállít.

18.000 munkavállalónk dolgozik azon, hogy utasaink számára minél magasabb színvonalú szolgáltatást nyújthassunk.

Tartozz te is közénk!

Amiben számítunk rád:
az Energiagazdálkodási irányítási rendszerhez (EgIR) kapcsolódó dokumentációk (kézikönyv, szabályzatok, eljárásleírások, folyamatleírások, munkautasítások) előkészítésének, bevezetésének, kiadásának felügyelete és koordinálása,
energiaelemzések készítése az energia-felhasználási adatok alapján az energiagazdálkodási teljesítmény növelése érdekében,
javaslattétel energiahatékonyságot növelő beruházásokra - megtérülési idő számítással alátámasztva -, visszamérés készítése az energiagazdálkodási teljesítmény növelésének mértékéről,
az energiaátvizsgálással kapcsolatos feladatok-, dokumentációk elkészítése, koordinálása,
szabvány alapján a szabályzatban foglaltak folyamatos fejlesztése az energiagazdálkodási teljesítmény növelésének és a dokumentáció-kezelés javításának érdekében.

Az ideális jelölt:
rendelkezik állami szakirányú felsőfokú végzettséggel (gépészmérnök, villamosmérnök, épületvillamossági mérnök, energetikai mérnök) diplomával,
min. 3 év releváns szakmai tapasztalattal,
B kategóriás jogosítvánnyal,
felhasználói szintű számítógépes ismerettel (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), valamint
pontos, precíz, felelősségteljes munkavégzésre képes.

Számos juttatásunk közül néhány:
hosszú távú munkalehetőség, stabil nagyvállalatnál,
változatos feladatok, szakmai fejlődési lehetőség,
ingyenes vagy kedvezményes utazási lehetőség, családtagjaidnak is,
önkéntes nyugdíjpénztári hozzájárulás (a havi bruttó munkabér bruttó 3,5%-a, 1% önrész vállalása mellett),
fizetésnapon mindig pontosan érkező, 100%-ban bejelentett jövedelem.

Döntésedhez az alábbi információk is fontosak lehetnek:
munkavégzés helye: 5000 Szolnok, Nagysándor József út 24.;
a munkaviszony időtartama: határozatlan idejű munkaviszony;
a munkaidő: teljes munkaidő;
kezdés: jelentkezés elbírálását követően azonnal.
Ha tetszett, amit eddig olvastál, jelentkezz!
Önéletrajz leadása a „Jelentkezem” gombra kattintva.
Jelentkezésed leadása előtt, kérjük, olvasd el adatvédelmi tájékoztatónkat: http://www.volanbusz.hu/hu/adatvedelem

Autószerelő

A VOLÁNBUSZ Zrt. közel 100 éves múlttal, 63 járműfenntartási és 76 forgalmi telephellyel rendelkező, országosan működő, stabil hátterű, 100%-ban magyar tulajdonú állami vállalat. Országonkénti összehasonlításban a legnagyobb járműparkkal rendelkező európai autóbuszos szolgáltató.

Társaságunk évente csaknem 670 millió utast szállít.

Országosan közel 1000 fő autószerelő kollégánk dolgozik minden nap azért, hogy utasaink biztonságban érjék el úti céljukat.

Tartozz te is közénk!

Ami Rád vár, ha csatlakozol hozzánk:
év végi lojalitást elismerő juttatás és társasági munkaviszony jubileuma esetén törzsgárda kitüntetés,
jól tervezhető munkabeosztás;
hosszú távú munkalehetőség, stabil nagyvállalatnál;
ingyenes vagy kedvezményes utazási lehetőség, családtagjaidnak is;
önkéntes nyugdíjpénztári hozzájárulás (a havi bruttó munkabér bruttó 3,5%-a, 1% önrész vállalása mellett),
szociális gondoskodás munkavállalóink részére;
fizetésnapon mindig pontosan érkező, 100%-ban bejelentett jövedelem;
bérpótlékokkal növelt alapbér;
változatos munka, különféle típusú járműveken;
munkaruha;
tapasztalt kollégák támogatása,

Amiben számítunk Rád:
az autóbuszok műszaki állapotának ellenőrzése;
a hibák felismerését követően a hibás alkatrészek javítása;
műszeres vizsgálatok és diagnosztikai beállítások elvégzése.

Ezt várjuk Tőled:
rendelkezz autószerelő szakképzettséggel;
a B, C, D kategóriás jogosítvány, illetve az autóbusz-javításban szerzett tapasztalat előnyt jelent.

További információk:
Szolnok lesz a munkavégzésed központja;
teljes mukaidőben foglalkoztatunk;

IT system administrator
Responsibilities:
Monitoring and maintaining networks and servers. Upgrading, installing, and configuring new hardware and software to meet company objectives. Implementing security protocols and procedures to prevent potential threats. Creating user accounts and performing access control. Performing diagnostic tests and debugging procedures to optimize computer systems. Documenting processes, as well as backing up and archiving data. Developing data retrieval and recovery procedures. Designing and implementing efficient end-user feedback and error reporting systems. Keeping up to date with advancements and best practices in IT administration. Participates in the creation of yearly budget.
Requirements and skills:
Bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology, information systems, or similar. At least 3 years' experience in a similar role. Experience with IT systems, networks, and related technologies. Knowledge of Microsoft Windows environment is mandatory. Other operating systems (Linux) are appreciated. Knowledge of virtualization technology is a must (VMware ESXi and/or Microsoft Hyper-V). Solid knowledge of best practices in IT administration and system security. Robust organizational and time management skills. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent interpersonal and communication skills. Any applicable professional certification is a plus.
What we offer:
International environment. Possibility of development and further training. Competitive benefits package.

JobTitle: Sustainability Quality Management System engineer (Quality engineer)
fullJobDescribtion:
Xylem is a leading water technology company committed to "solving water" by creating innovative and smart technology solutions to meet the world's water, wastewater and energy needs Xylem’s well-known global brands have served the water market for many decades with products sold in more than 150 countries. The Company's more than 16,500 employees bring broad applications expertise with a strong focus on identifying comprehensive, sustainable solutions. Xylem does business with more than 40 market-leading product brands.
XYLEM Service Hungary Kft. is looking for a new colleague for the following position:

Sustainability Quality Management System engineer (Quality Engineer)
Task(s):
Has product (product-family) responsibility from quality point of view.
Has the responsibility to lead the product (product-family) APQP team which creates APQP documentation.
Inspects a variety of raw materials, components, sub-assemblies, assemblies, etc. in accordance with applicable specifications.
Plans the use of inspection methods while performing a wide variety of gauging set-ups and devises methods and means to check piece parts, sub-assemblies and complete assemblies for non- conformities.
Utilizes an array of surface plate techniques to check first piece and/or process material. Notifies supervisor of defects.
Uses various techniques of inspection for verifying that defects have been screened or corrected before releasing to the next operation or stock.
Follows ISO 9001 requirements and supports internal audits
Uses statistical sampling plans, statistical process control techniques and geometric tolerancing logic during inspections.
Verifies documentation supporting certification of those materials requiring certification is correct. Reports all irregularities to supervisor.
Prepares clear and concise written inspection procedures and reports.
Gives assistance to production personnel relative to the inspection process as required. Sets production and/or other gages for own use or use by other employees.
Uses a wide variety of measuring instruments such as, but not limited to, micrometers, optical comparators, calipers gage blocks, indicators, meters, etc. Selects measuring instruments based on tolerances of characteristics, dimensions, specifications or features to be checked.
Requirement(s):
Good communication skill in written and spoken English is mandatory.
At least 2-3 years of experience in similar position, preferable if in pumps or electrical motor industries.
The employee must be willingness and problem solving oriented.
Used to work with technical drawings, standards and specification, he has experience on using electronic, electrical and mechanical measurement and testing equipments.
Knowledge of ISO 9001.
Used to work with data: from key business metric monitoring take actions at shop floor, design and supplier level to assure continuous improvement.
Knowledge of daily monitoring system is preferable.
Our offer: Cafeteria, travel expenses and other benefits
Location: Cegléd, Külső-Kátai út 41.

Munkakör megnevezése: Autóvillamossági szerelő

Munkavégzés megyéje: Jász-Nagykun-Szolnok

Munkavégzés helye: Szolnok

Autóvillamossági szerelő

A VOLÁNBUSZ Zrt. közel 100 éves múlttal, 63 járműfenntartási és 76 forgalmi telephellyel rendelkező, országosan működő, stabil hátterű, 100%-ban magyar tulajdonú állami vállalat. Országonkénti összehasonlításban a legnagyobb járműparkkal rendelkező európai autóbuszos szolgáltató.

Társaságunk évente csaknem 670 millió utast szállít.

Országosan közel 1000 fő autószerelő kollégánk dolgozik minden nap azért, hogy utasaink biztonságban érjék el úti céljukat.

Tartozz te is közénk!

Ami Rád vár, ha csatlakozol hozzánk:
társasági munkaviszony jubileuma esetén törzsgárda kitüntetés,
jól tervezhető munkabeosztás;
hosszú távú munkalehetőség, stabil nagyvállalatnál;
ingyenes vagy kedvezményes utazási lehetőség, családtagjaidnak is;
önkéntes nyugdíjpénztári hozzájárulás (a havi bruttó alapbér 3,5%-a, 1% önrész vállalása mellett);
szociális gondoskodás munkavállalóink részére;
fizetésnapon mindig pontosan érkező, 100%-ban bejelentett jövedelem;
bérpótlékokkal növelt alapbér;
változatos munka, különféle típusú járműveken;
munkaruha;
tapasztalt kollégák támogatása,

Amiben számítunk Rád:
autóbuszok elektromos hibáinak feltárása, diagnosztizálás
autóbuszok elektromos hálózatának, berendezéseinek javítása
autóbuszok fedélzeti számítógépeiből adatok kiolvasása

Ezt várjuk Tőled:
rendelkezz autóvillamossági szerelő szakképzettséggel;
autóbusz-javításban szerzett tapasztalat előnyt jelent.

További információk:
Szolnok, Nagysándor József utca 24. szám alatti telephely lesz a munkavégzésed központja;
a kiválasztást követően azonnal munkába állhatsz;

Would you like to embrace a stimulating career challenge and add a multicultural dynamic work environment to your daily basis? Do you love communicating with people, enabling them and fostering their talents? Here you will find a high skilled and dynamic growing team. If process optimization and quality enhancement are key terms to you, we believe that you would be the perfect fit for our new Continuous Improvement Program Expert in Cegléd.
As a Continuous Improvement Program Expert, you will be the YIP Program Manager responsible for developing the related framework and establishing a culture following the STAR Model. You will also institutionalize the Program and ensure sustainability.

In your new role you will:
Develop, deploy and sustain a Continuous Improvement Program to handle operational improvements which complements the YIP program (e.g.: Mini-Kaizen, Small Group Activities, etc.).
Deploy and sustain a Visual Management System enabling the YIP and the Continuous Improvement.
Team up with the communication department to campaign for the YIP and to reward the participants.
Lead projects to improve the efficiency of the YIP and the Continuous Improvement Program moving to the next level of digitalization (introduction of Electronic Booth in the shop floor, Introduction of a Ticket System).

As an experienced enabler and strong communicator, you build and leverage professional networks towards achieving organizational goals and motivating people for joint success. You have a great set of analytical skills and a structured, self-driven working style that enables you to take ownership over your work and solve problems in an efficient way. You are thrilled by technical expertise development and exchange, being able to work well with your team towards common goals and easily coordinate your work with your colleagues. Furthermore, your proactive mindset allied to your focus on quality allow you to make things better, faster, and more efficient, playing a crucial role in the whole team's excellence goals.

You are best equipped for this task if you have:
Degree in a Scientific field.
At least 5 years of experience in a Manufacturing environment.
Project Management skills would be an advantage.
Knowledge of quality methods/tools , such as Lean Methods (5S, Standard Work, etc.) and Six Sigma . Six Sigma certification would be an advantage.
Background in Data Analytics and Data Base .
Strong communication skills , with a focus on results approach and a project management and team player mindset ;
Fluency in English and Hungarian .

Please send us your CV in English.

Cegléd is a backend production site and produces and tests IGBT Modules and other components.

Part of your life. Part of tomorrow.

Infineon is a world leader in semiconductor solutions that make life easier, safer, and greener. Our solutions for efficient energy management, smart mobility, and secure, seamless communications link the real and the digital world.

Backend
The backend segments enable the development of comprehensive innovation across the entire value chain: starting with chip manufacturing, to wafer testing, preassembly, package development and development of new materials. The backend cluster combines the competencies for planning, productivity, innovation and quality, assembly and testing.

* The term gender in the sense of the General Equal Treatment Act (GETA) or other national legislation refers to the biological assignment to a gender group. At Infineon we are proud to embrace (gender) diversity, including female, male and diverse.

Xylem |ˈzīləm|
1) The tissue in plants that brings water upward from the roots;
2) A leading global water technology company.
Xylem is a leading global water technology company with 17.000 employees dedicated to solving the world’s most challenging water issues. We are a global provider of efficient, innovative and sustainable water technologies improving the way water is used, managed, conserved and re-used. Our international team is unified in a common purpose: creating advanced technology and other trusted solutions to solve the world’s water challenges. We are committed to creating an organization of inclusion and diversity, where everyone feels involved, respected, valued and connected, and where everyone is free to bring their authentic selves and ideas.


Job Summary:
This is an excellent opportunity for an experienced HR professional to work with a global team of smart and ambitious people. The role will be responsible for leading the Human Resources function and collaborating with the business in ensuring the delivery of the HR activities. The successful candidate will report to the VP HR Water Infrastructure – CT Europe.
As a Senior HR Business leader, the Regional HR Business Partner will provide strategic HR support, insight and acumen to the senior leadership Easter Europe team, thus assisting in the delivery of company objectives. You will collaborate with senior HR managers from the regional areas and Centers of Excellence on a broad variety of HR-related issues and projects. Working within a fast-paced environment, you will act as the key point of contact for your region. Leads, collaborate or contributes to projects with other HR team members or cross-functionally in support of the enterprise s strategic goals.
You will work closely with the VP Regional and wider EE team in the development and delivery of the people strategy in a true business partner style. You will share knowledge with the wider team, acting as a mentor to support the development of fellow ambitious colleagues. This support includes leading the implementation of core HR field initiatives regarding the culture, engagement, succession planning, talent development, as well as HR processes and training.
The Regional HR Business Partner will guide, mentor and challenge business leaders and be the consultant on People initiatives and support the VP HR in the development and delivery of the HR strategy and agenda to deliver on the company’s vision and mission.

Essential Duties/Principal Responsibilities:
Analyzes current trends, culture survey info, policies and reporting to make recommendations on improvements to the workplace. Gather and analyze HR and client feedback and diagnose business / people issues to collaborate with local management in developing and implementing solutions.
Supports organization design, people development and change management focused on development and implementation of activities against business strategy.
Serves as the strategic partner to the VP HR WI-Europe CT about driving talent development, engagement, and core HR initiatives for the field organization.
Supports talent management processes in the field including the performance review process, succession planning, leadership assessments and internal talent movement. Drives and facilitates identification of high potential talent and build a strategic plan to support the growth of the business.
Serves as an advocate – Solicits and listens to stakeholder concerns and takes an active role in resolving problems.
Provides information, or facilitates partners' ability to obtain information, about benefits, compensation and training.
Handles all escalated employee relations issues and concerns by working with internal partners and senior leaders to determine resolutions. Must be experienced with internal investigatory processes and how to ensure outcomes are fair, consistent, and compliant with company policies and applicable laws and regulations.
Leads Labor Relations when required. Provide consultation and support to managers on HR issues and applicable company policies and employment laws.
Understands company reporting and can analyze effectively to make timely recommendations to alleviate risk or positively influence the business or associates.
Participates in designing and implementing training and development programs. Cooperates with external consulting companies. Optimize the investment (optimal use of public funds).
Staffing/recruiting in cooperation with our TA Team and local agencies (applicant flow, pre- employment, interviews, on-boarding for personnel, students, and temporary employees)
Recruits the best talents and organizes for them the needed induction plan.
Manages the annual salary review process
Facilitates client compliance with HR policy and coaches’ clients on Xylem values, behaviors and Diversity,Equity and Inclusion (DEI) as required.

Minimum Qualifications: Education, Experience, Skills, Abilities, License/Certification:
10 years of HR Business Partner experience supporting multiple locations and remote customers.
Proven expertise in talent management, workforce planning, change management,
organizational development, and other strategic people initiatives in the gaming industry or with a product development group.
Prior experience working for a large corporation.
Demonstrated success working in a fast-paced, matrix environment, with a track record of accomplishments with measurable business impact. Ability to quickly learn new skills, systems, and procedures – adaptable.
Experience with creating lasting change using intentional organizational design and
development practices.
Full knowledge of the legal implications of the employment relationship.
Excellent interpersonal, communication and presentation skills.
Ability to establish and sustain relationships at all levels of the organization.
Strong organizational skills, flexibility, and ability to handle stressful situations calmly.
Demonstrated ability to gather, analyze, and utilize data to influence business decisions.
Understands where the data sits and how to combine it to support actions and decisions.
Demonstrated continuous improvement mindset and familiarity with continuous improvement practices.
Excellent project management skills. Demonstrated ability to juggle multiple priorities and meet time-sensitive deadlines.
Must be self-motivated and able to work both independently and as a team member.
Strong business acumen.

Preferred Qualifications:
Bachelor’s in Human Resources, Organization Development, Business Administration, or another related field required.
High level of English and other languages is nice to have (Polish, Russian and Hungarian).
Demonstrated working knowledge of HR-related employee law and regulations in EE countries.
Superior customer service orientation, rigorous, responsive and great sense of confidentiality. Ethics and Compliance must be part of its DNA.
Able to manage projects and execute on action plans.
Advanced proficiency with Microsoft Office and HRIS systems (as Workday).

Key Competencies:
Emotional Intelligence
Building talent capability
Continuous improvement mindset. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Consulting & Business Partnership
Effective communication. Ability to communicate and build relationships at all levels.
Excellent communicator including facilitation, verbal, and written skills
Inspiring accountability. Strong organizational skills, keeps timelines and meets deadlines.
High attention to detail, ensures accuracy in completion of work
Good sense of humor.
Keys to Success
Commitment to deliver high-quality work results regardless of work complexity.
Ability to build collaborative relationships both internally and externally.
Ability to accurately analyze and diagnose situations to recommend the best path forward; advocates for action to proactively address issues.
Takes a positive approach in spite of obstacles; displays resilience in the face of resistance.
Natural curiosity and desire to continuously learn and develop oneself professionally; seeks feedback to improve.
Constant focus to find better, more innovative ways of working; never satisfied with the status quo.
We Offer You More Than Just “A Job”
Professional Development – To advance the capabilities of our people, we offer a wide variety of experiences to support our employees’ professional growth and continuous learning.
Total Rewards – We offer comprehensive programs for compensation, benefits, recognition, learning and development, work-life integration and corporate citizenship.
Watermark – Watermark is our corporate social responsibility program working to provide education and access to safe water to ensure healthy lives, gender equality, and resilient communities.
Employees have the opportunity to learn and volunteer on various water-related projects.
Employee Networks – Our Employee Networks provide a professional, supportive network for mployees from diverse backgrounds, including Women’s, LGBT+ and Allies, Veteran’s, People of
Color and Allies, EmergingLeaders, and Working Parents Networks.

Xylem is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.

Munkakör megnevezése: Biztonságtechnikai főmunkatárs

Munkavégzés megyéje: Jász-Nagykun-Szolnok, Nógrád

Munkavégzés helye: Magyarország (a munkakörre elsősorban Jász-Nagykun-Szolnok és Nógrád megye területéről várunk jelentkezőket)

Jelentkezési határidő: 2022-08-30

Biztonságtechnikai főmunkatárs

A VOLÁNBUSZ Zrt. közel 100 éves múlttal, 63 járműfenntartási és 76 forgalmi telephellyel rendelkező, országosan működő, stabil hátterű, 100%-ban magyar tulajdonú állami vállalat. Országonkénti összehasonlításban a legnagyobb járműparkkal rendelkező európai autóbuszos szolgáltató.

Társaságunk évente csaknem 670 millió utast szállít.

18.000 munkavállalónk dolgozik azon, hogy utasaink számára minél magasabb színvonalú szolgáltatást nyújthassunk.

Tartozz te is közénk!

Amiben számítunk rád:
beléptetőrendszer üzemeltetése (jogosultság kezelés, rendszerfelügyelet, kártya-megszemélyesítés, hibakezelés koordinálás),
elektronikus megfigyelő rendszer, behatolásjelző rendszer, és tűzjelző rendszer üzemeltetése (rendszerfelügyelet, hibakezelés koordinálás, jogosultság kezelés),
beruházások biztonságtechnikai felügyelte, koordinálása,
biztonságtechnikai rendszerek üzemeltetése, felügyelete, nyilvántartása,
biztonságtechnikai berendezéssel, -eszközökkel védett, illetve védendő területek, épületek, helyiségek veszély és kockázat elemzéseinek, védelmi koncepciójának elkészítése, a technikai védelem konkrét igényeinek meghatározása,
külső beszállítók, partnerek felkutatása, versenyeztetési eljárásokban aktív közreműködés
biztonságtechnikai beruházások előkészítése, felügyelete, koordinálása,
biztonságtechnikai eszközök karbantartás, javítás megrendelése, felügyelete, szerződésszerű kezelése,
kapcsolattartás külső szerződött partnerekkel,
adatszolgáltatások teljesítése,
szükség esetén oktatás tartása a kezelő személyzet részére a telepített eszközök/rendszerek használatára,
alkalomszerűen vagyonőri szolgálat felügyeleti, ellenőrzési feladatainak ellátása,
a vagyonvédelmet és adatvédelmet célzó jogszabályok, belső szabályozások betartatása a szakterület vonatkozásában,
visszaélésekkel, bűncselekményekkel kapcsolatos káresemények vizsgálataiban való aktív közreműködés.

Az ideális jelölt:
rendelkezik legalább középfokú biztonságtechnikai vagy elektronikai – műszerész, biztonságtechnikai rendszer-telepítő végzettséggel,
biztonságtechnikai és mechanikai rendszerek, eszközök általános ismeretével,
informatikai hálózatok üzemeltetésében szerzett tapasztalata van,
feddhetetlen előéletű,
vezetői engedélye van „B” kategóriára, valamint
műszaki-technikai beállítottság,
terhelhetőség, rugalmasság, mobilitás,
precizitás, önálló munkavégzés jellemzi.

Számos juttatásunk közül néhány:
hosszú távú munkalehetőség, stabil nagyvállalatnál;
ingyenes vagy kedvezményes utazási lehetőség, családtagjaidnak is;
önkéntes nyugdíjpénztári hozzájárulás (a havi bruttó munkabér bruttó 3,5%-a, 1% önrész vállalása mellett);
szociális gondoskodás munkavállalóink részére;
fizetésnapon mindig pontosan érkező, 100%-ban bejelentett jövedelem;

Döntésedhez az alábbi információk is fontosak lehetnek:
munkavégzés helye: Magyarország (a munkakörre Jász-Nagykun-Szolnok, Heves és Nógrád megye területéről várunk jelentkezőket - a munkavégzés pontos helye a kiválasztott személy lakcímét figyelembevéve kerül meghatározásra);
a munkaviszony időtartama: határozatlan idejű munkaviszony;
a munkaidő: teljes munkaidő;
kezdés: a jelentkezés elbírálását követően azonnal.
Ha tetszett, amit eddig olvastál, jelentkezz!
Önéletrajz leadása a „Jelentkezem” gombra kattintva.
Jelentkezésed leadása előtt, kérjük, olvasd el adatvédelmi tájékoztatónkat: http://www.volanbusz.hu/hu/adatvedelem
